snippet: Andrew Luck led the Colts to a 35-33 win over the Lions on Sunday, giving him more wins than any rookie quarterback drafted No. 1 overall in the Super Bowl era.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck leads team to a 35-33 victory over Detroit Lions; other football scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Luck led the Colts to a 35-33 win over the Lions on Sunday, giving him more wins than any rookie quarterback drafted No. 1 overall in the Super Bowl era.

headline.seo: Andrew Luck Steps Up in Pocket and Moves Closer to Playoffs
headline.main: Luck Steps Up in Pocket and Moves Closer to Playoffs
headline.print_headline: Luck Steps Up in Pocket And Moves Closer to Playoffs
